titleStmt.title: Canterbury Christmas or, a true relation of the insurrection in Canterbury on Christmas day last, with the great hurt that befell divers persons thereby. / Written by a Cittizen there, to his friend in London.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 1st", "1647", the "8" in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
